title: The Fourth Wall / Quarta parete (1973) Paolo Turco, Françoise Prévost | Crime | Movie, Subtitled

sources.title: The Fourth Wall / Quarta parete (1973) Paolo Turco, Françoise Prévost | Crime | Movie, Subtitled
sources.description:
Marco Baroni spent four years in an English school. When he returns to Rome, the behavior of his family members finds him unprepared: his father, mother and sister Marzia have changed so much that they are not recognized. He is deeply troubled by their immoral behavior.

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/XdKnlB--tqA
Italian audio subtitled in more than 30 languages. Make your choice in the video settings ⚙️

Director: Adriano Bolzoni
Writers: Adriano Bolzoni, Giustino Caporale, Marco Masi
Cast: Peter Lawford, Françoise Prévost, Paolo Turco
Genres: Italian film, Giallo, Crime, Thriller
Original title: Quarta parete
